SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.codehaus.preon.annotation
Annotation Type BoundNumber

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface BoundNumber

The annotation to add metadata on the way an integer field is represented in the BitBuffer.

Author:
Wilfred Springer

Optional Element Summary
 ByteOrder byteOrder
          The type of endianness: either ByteOrder.LittleEndian or ByteOrder.BigEndian.
 String match
          The value to match.
 String size
          The number of bits used to represent the numeric value.
 Class<? extends Number> type
          Type that is used in deciding the way to do the decoding/encoding.
 

byteOrder

public abstract ByteOrder byteOrder
The type of endianness: either ByteOrder.LittleEndian or ByteOrder.BigEndian.

Returns:
The type of endianness. Defaults to ByteOrder.LittleEndian.
Default:
org.codehaus.preon.buffer.ByteOrder.LittleEndian

size

public abstract String size
The number of bits used to represent the numeric value. Defaults to 0, allowing the Codec to make its own decision on the number of bits to be used; however, they are expected to respect the following defaults:

TypeNumber of bits
Long, long64
Integer, int32
Short, short16
Byte, byte8

The type of this annotation might be turned into a String in the future, to allow the size to be based on an expression instead of a fixed value.

Returns:
The number of bits used to represent the numeric value.
Default:
""

match

public abstract String match
The value to match.

Default:
""

type

public abstract Class<? extends Number> type
Type that is used in deciding the way to do the decoding/encoding. In default case the type of the field is used.

Returns:
the type used in decoding/encoding
Default:
java.lang.Number.class
